TopicTitle: Jebediah Kermin's Rocket Ship Checklist and Procedure Reference Ver 1.0

Articles.Content:
Hey All,

After killing a couple Kermin's accidentally because I forgot to check my staging after making changes to my ship, I decided that a checklist would be pretty helpful. I am open to suggestions if you think there are things that I have wrong or should have mentioned. I intend to expand this guide to include procedures for re-entry, rendevous, docking, orbital transition, etc. I have tried to make this as similar as I could to real aviation checklists. It is a PDF file for easy printing. I hope you enjoy!

http://sharesend.com/745albj8

Create a checklist as a wiki article and link it here:

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorials

Looks very good ... and I second the person who wrote that it should be included in the Wiki

Maybe could be expanded for chapters regarding Descent and Ground operations.

(Well, O.K., Ground OPs may be too short to deserve an own chapter )

Just for completeness sake (and as IÃ‚Â´m sure that it will be mentioned by another person, if I wouldnÃ‚Â´t mention it),

I might point you to a slight spelling error you made in Orbit - 6: Guages instead of Gauges
